EinDeutschMan
i keep getting fatal error or database is out of date and could not be updated. when i try to install, what am i doing wrong?

@J9891

Two questions:
1. Did you try to install Rosetta Stone once before and it failed?
2. Do you have the internet BLOCKED - if not, do so.

If you had an install fail, you'll have to do a little "housecleaning". 
Go to the "ProgramDataRosetta Stone" folder and if there is a tracking.db3 file in that folder, delete it.

Then go to the Rosetta Stone PROGRAM folder, (NOT the folder where the languages are installed) and see if there is the tracking.db3 file in that folder too, if so delete it as well.

The tracking.db3 file tracks your progress through Rosetta Stone, and can sometime get corrupted which can cause the error you have.

If this does NOT solve the problem, then you may have to re-install Rosetta Stone.
Let me know...

@pup123,

If you are using the ISO's you must "mount" them first, I use PowerISO4.7, just because I'm accustomed to it.

Have you DL'd and installed PowerISO?
if so, open it, go to "options", "configuration...","Virtual drive", set "number of virtual drives" to 1, "OK"
(I set the number of drives to 3, so I can mount all 3 language levels at the same time)
Reboot,
PowerISO icon should be in the taskbar.
right click the icon,
click on "Mount image to Drive[whatever it says]"
navigate to where ever you have the language ISO's,
select language level
right click on PowerISO icon again,
you should see something like
"Mount Image to Drive[E:] D:Downloads Rosetta stone Japanese - Level 1.iso"

(remember, your drive letters & paths are probably different from what I have here, these are just for demonstration.)

If every thing has gone right, go back into Rosetta stone and add the language(s)

Keep getting hit with the activation problem. I've tried patching and using the LA_products file. Anything I might be doing wrong?

@spm201,

I'm not sure, but if you did the installation in the order you described, you might have done things out of sequence. If you are in doubt, UN-install your current version, and start over. :-(

1. Block internet
2. Install program (V3), DO NOT run program.
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7035540/Rosetta_Stone_v3__amp_amp__Patch.iso
3. Copy files (crack program and Licencingdll.DLL) from Crack folder to program folder where Rosetta Stone is installed and run it.
(if the crack sets off your AV software, IGNORE IT! I've used this same program for over a year without any problems)
4. Block Rosetta Stone program from internet access.
5. Set your firewall to "allow trusted outbound" ONLY! (or the equivalent.)
(if you block ALL internet access, you may get a 1117 error, speech component for voice recognition.)
6. Do NOT update the program!
7. Install language levels 1, 2 & 3.
8. Install v3.4.7 in the same folder as v3 
(overwrite the contents).
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7035678/Rosetta_Stone_v3.4.7_w_Patch.iso
9. Install language levels 4 & 5.

You SHOULD be set.

Let me know...

@mizike89,

Disregard any ISO's you already have.
The "Preinstalled version" will be the one you want to use.
i.e. "Rosetta Stone v3.4.7 Preinstalled"

The language pack(s) will also be named "Preinstalled"
i.e. "Spanish (Latin America) levels 1-5 Preinstalled"

You will have detailed instructions, but the bottom line is that you will have
1 ISO for the program, and 1 ISO for EACH language, all levels in 1 ISO ( I hope!)

The "Rosetta Stone v3.4.7 Preinstalled" ISO will have two folders in it.
The 1st folder will be named "Rosetta Stone", and gets copied to the C:/ProgramData folder
The 2nd folder will be named "Rosetta Stone v3", and gets copied to the C:/Program Files (x86) folder

The "Spanish (Latin America) Levels 1-5" ISO will have one folder in it
The folder will be named "Contents" and will be copied into C:/Program Files (x86)/Rosetta Stone v3 folder you just created.

That's IT! 
The first time you run the program, you will create your user profile, and set up the program as you want. (Speech recognition, user name, etc.)
The Language pack(s) will show up as activated, with all X's

Now, suppose you want to learn German as well...
You simply DL the "German Levels 1-5 Preinstalled" ISO
It will have 1 folder named "Contents"
You simply copy it to the C:/Program Files (x86)/Rosetta Stone v3 folder just like you did the Spanish, and now you have German installed AND activated as well!

Now, lets just hope I can get it to work the way I want it to...

I'll let you know soon.
